item.title: ByteDance’s UI-TARS can take over your computer, outperforms GPT-4o and Claude
item.description: UI-TARS understands graphical user interfaces (GUIs), applies reasoning and takes autonomous, step-by-step action.

item.title: Google releases free Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking model, pressuring OpenAI’s premium strategy
item.description: Google challenges OpenAI with free Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking model, offering million-token processing, native code execution, and breakthrough perform...

item.title: Samsung teases Android XR devices coming later this year
item.description: Samsung teased its efforts with multimodal AI and new form factors including smart glasses and extended reality (XR) devices.

item.title: DeepMind’s new inference-time scaling technique improves planning accuracy in LLMs
item.description: With "Mind Evolution" LLMs can use search and genetic algorithms to generate and combine different solutions and find the optimal one.

item.title: OpenAI Stargate is a $500B bet: America’s AI Manhattan Project or costly dead end?
item.description: OpenAI, Oracle, Softbank and MGX are investing a record amount in new AI infrastructure even as China's DeepSeek outperforms on cost.
